description: This is a front-end JavaScript source file for a quiz page component built with LightningJS. It defines a 'Quiz' UI component including state management, rendering template, and interaction methods for a quiz application.

classes.name: Quiz
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing the quiz interface, managing questions display, user interaction, and progress.

methods.name: getOptionColor
methods.description: Determines the display color of a quiz option based on selection and feedback state.

methods.name: getOptionTextColor
methods.description: Determines the text color of a quiz option based on selection and feedback state.

methods.name: evaluateSelection
methods.description: Checks if the selected answer is correct, updates feedback flags.

methods.name: persistScore
methods.description: Stores the quiz score incrementally in local storage.

methods.name: resetScore
methods.description: Resets the quiz score stored in local storage to zero.

methods.name: navigateNext
methods.description: Evaluates current answer, updates score, and navigates to next question or results page.
